Intro.Message: There's one thing I never liked in our love story
Intro.SubMessage: And I am going to change it today, please swipe.

Intro.Message: You never swiped for me on Tinder! Never!!
I will get my revenge today
I spent a whole leap year writing why I love you
And you will need to swipe for every single one of them
Intro.SubMessage: You can swipe up, left or right, anywhere. I'm being nice...
Swipe for me... keep swiping for me
